post:
March Offers from 23 Hosts and 70+ different products – VPS, Dedicated, DDOS protection, Licensing & Mail

March 3, 2018 @ 11:32 am, by Frank Williams

Something a little bit different to the usual offers and this is my first lowendbox post so the formatting may not be the greatest!

I asked all the providers as well as a few that don’t usually post here if they have anything special they want to promote, not necessarily low end prices but anything goes, no limits and here is a big list of what they put forward!

Big thanks to Gabe from IOflood who sent in a fantastic 18TB storage server offer, they don’t have representation on LET/B right now but this is an exclusive deal for LET/B members so show them some love.

Thanks to all hosts that put something in, This will be repeated in June, September and December.

HetrixTools

Professional Uptime Monitoring Package

Some of the main features:
– Extremely accurate outage detection
– Public/Private Reports
– Bulk Reports – can be used as a nice looking Status Page (example: https://hetrixtools.com/status/)
– Downtime Diagnostics
– Notifications via: Email, SMS, PushBullet, Pushover, Twitter, Slack, Discord, HipChat, PagerDuty, Telegram and Webhooks
– Domain Expiration Monitor
– NameServers Change Detection
– SSL Expiration Monitor
– Server resource monitoring on most linux distros, even on shared hosting (with our php agent)
– Full list of features can be found on our pricing page

If paying for such a service is not something you’d want to do, we also have a Free Package that is mostly limited on quantity and not quality, which means you’d still be getting most of the paid features, but fewer monitors.

Not convinced yet? See what some of our clients have to say:
https://hetrixtools.com/reviews/

Be sure to contact us if you have any questions, suggestions or any type of feedback.
Thank you for taking the time to read this promo and I hope you’ll find HetrixTools a useful monitoring service.
Have a nice day!
